article_html:
Two of the world's best pound-for-pound boxers, Floyd Mayweather and Manny Pacquiao, met on 2 May for a highly-anticipated bout which was dubbed (by Mayweather himself) 'The Fight of the Century'. Here is a brick-by-brick reconstruction of some of the key moments

Two of the world's best pound-for-pound boxers, Floyd Mayweather and Manny Pacquiao, met on 2 May for a highly-anticipated bout which was dubbed (by Mayweather himself) 'The Fight of the Century'. Here is a brick-by-brick reconstruction of some of the key moments of the richest fight in history (audio from Sky Box Office)
text: Two of the world's best pound-for-pound boxers, Floyd Mayweather and Manny Pacquiao, met on 2 May for a highly-anticipated bout which was dubbed (by Mayweather himself) 'The Fight of the Century'. Here is a brick-by-brick reconstruction of some of the key moments of the richest fight in history (audio from Sky Box Office)
title: Floyd Mayweather defeats Manny Pacquiao – brick-by-brick video
